Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

Note that all the texts in this document that refer to two people - the speaker and the one spoken too - that can both be male or female.
Note that use of the 'localized' and 'alternative localized string' only applies for the gender of the speaker.
If the gender of the person spoken to requires inflection, please try to translate the text in a way that doesn't require such inflection. If this is impossible, please get in touch with us informing us of which lines this concerns and how they would be inflected in the language you are translating too.
{STR_leaderName} the bleeder fool! You dare present yourself to the swarm? Speak quickly and with good purpose, or our talons will dissect your meat!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Krz’Tk Xrrlt Ptkch! {STR_leaderName}, we refuse to swarm with you – you remind us of the hated Enslavers! The Kir’Ko will never allow another to shackle us again. Our hive is hungry for your flesh, so state your intention and then leave us be. We follow a different path from you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Greetings, mammal. The Kir’Ko hear you and wonder which path you walk. Enlighten our thoughts and we will see how our values align with yours.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} of flesh and metal approaches us. We are Kir’Ko. Our swarm roams free and must first hear your words. Do you follow the path of harmony, or do you seek to spread discord?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Our dreams told us of your arrival, {STR_leaderName}. Dreams have shaped our destiny ever since we were still shackled by the Enslavers. We follow their prophetic vision. Are you a good omen or a nightmare?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}! Our antennae twitch excitedly for this meeting. Please, harmonize with us. We value your thoughts and ideas. Let us share.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

You would be welcome to visit our hive, {STR_leaderName}. Since the Unshackling made us free, we have strived for the betterment of all, and we have found that the Kir’Ko are not so different from your kind. Share your dreams with us.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
The Kir’Ko will speak with you now. I represent my brothers and sisters. Talk, tell us your struggles. Then we will talk and tell you of ours.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Our swarm greets you once again. Independence has made us strong. We can lend our strength to you, if needed. Tell us of your dreams for the future.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We have excess goods that you might be interested in, and the swarm desires something of yours. Perhaps a trade?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Your trade message acknowledged. We will consult the Readers and return with an answer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
None can contain the swarm! {STR_reasons}. Krz’P Zhm’Pak Gh’Toz! We war with you now!

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Enough of your tyranny! {STR_reasons}. Your days are numbered now, meat-thing. By claw and bolt, we will scour you from this world!

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Bleeder scum! We dream of you meeting a swift and paltry end, just as you deserve.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You remind us of the hideous Enslavers! Your civilization will fall as theirs did. We will spit on your broken corpses.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Pathetic, feeble wormling. Pretend not that we are the lesser beings. First look inside yourself and realize the truth of your own insignificance.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Leader {STR_leaderName}, we have heard your dreams resonate through the aether. We are impressed and humbled by your magnanimous presence.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Your works upon this world have delighted the swarm, lifting our spirits in the hope of a warm and bright future. We are pleased to work alongside you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Your soul is kind and generous, and your people are inspired by your leadership. You are a truly remarkable being.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
The Kir’Ko accept the proposed trade. May we both prosper.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Our needs are great, so we must accept the deal. But know that our current desperation is only temporary!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Apologies, we cannot do this. Our Readers have determined that this path is too clouded.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
No, never! We do not require your charity. Provide a more welcome offer instead.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
